short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get job applicant data from LinkedIn job posts

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Overview:
CampEd Hire - LinkedIn is a powerful Chrome extension designed to streamline the recruitment process by gathering job applicant data directly from LinkedIn job posts. Whether you're a recruiter, hiring manager, or HR professional, this tool simplifies the task of collecting and managing candidate information, saving you valuable time and effort.

Key Features:
Automated Data Collection: Seamlessly capture candidate details such as names, emails, phone numbers, LinkedIn profiles, custom questions and resumes from LinkedIn job postings with just a few clicks.

CSV Export: Once the data is collected, easily export it to a CSV file for further analysis or integration with your existing HR systems. This feature is particularly useful for maintaining organized records and facilitating data-driven decision-making.

Batch Resume Download: Download all candidate resumes in a single ZIP file, named after each candidate, for easy access and review. This feature eliminates the need to manually download each resume, significantly speeding up the recruitment process.

User-Friendly Interface: The extension is designed with simplicity in mind, offering an intuitive interface that requires no technical expertise to operate. Simply navigate to a LinkedIn job post, click the "Get Candidates" button, and let the extension do the rest.

Integration wtih CampEd Hire: With one click we should be able to push candidate info and resume to CampEd Hire (https://www.camped.ai/products/hire)

Why Install CampEd Hire?
Efficiency: Automate the tedious task of data entry, allowing you to focus on more strategic aspects of recruitment. By reducing manual effort, you can process more candidates in less time.
Accuracy: Minimize the risk of human error in data collection. The extension ensures that all relevant candidate information is captured accurately and consistently.
Convenience: With features like batch resume download and CSV export, managing candidate data becomes a hassle-free experience. The extension integrates seamlessly into your workflow, providing the tools you need right at your fingertips.
Security: CampEd Hire respects your privacy and data security. It operates entirely within your browser, ensuring that sensitive candidate information is handled securely.

Who Should Use CampEd Hire?
Recruiters and HR Professionals: Streamline your hiring process and manage candidate data more effectively.
Hiring Managers: Quickly gather and review applicant information to make informed hiring decisions.
Talent Acquisition Teams: Enhance your recruitment strategy with efficient data management tools.
